name: RSI Extreme Values
description: Verify RSI boundary conditions for all gains and all losses
rationale: PRD §4.6: All gains → RSI = 100, All losses → RSI = 0, No movement → RSI = 50

test_cases.name: all_gains_rsi_100
test_cases.notes: All positive changes result in RSI = 100

test_cases.name: all_losses_rsi_0
test_cases.notes: All negative changes result in RSI = 0

test_cases.name: no_movement_rsi_50
test_cases.notes: No price changes result in RSI = 50 (neutral)
